name: Envoy (itch) (Dylan Wolf)
description:
An unfinished Metroidvania-style (specifically, Castlevania II-style) game using Unity.

This was a project that I didn't have any specific plans for releasing, but put time into whenever I had no other game dev projects going on. It ends abruptly.

Default controls:

  • Attack - Ctrl
  • Jump - Space
  • Inventory - Left Alt
